ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder

Class MyKitchen

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.Model<View>
      • ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.MyKitchen

  • public class MyKitchen
extends Model<View>
    MyKitchen manipulates a list of ingredients. It stores the list to the file filename. It can add/remove/replace ingredients to/from the list. It can sort the list by the type of the Ingredient And it also provides the functionality of searching ingredients by keywords
    Version:
    1.0 07/03/13
    Author:
    cmput-301 team 2
    See Also:
    Ingredient, Recipe
